entity.name: The White House

text: @WhiteHouse @HHS_ASH @realDonaldTrump Trump is the worst president in history. He is a disaster for this country. Trump has no plans because he couldn’t think about easy way to solve a problem. Trump dealing with covid-19 caused Americans to loose thousands of lives. Trump lies everyday to coverup.
